content.detailedDescription:
Driving south on i-87 outside glen falls, ny. in all the organic shapes of the clouds, a straight line caught my eye. it didn't extend all the way to the ground at first, but was hanging from the bottom of the clouds. it tilted at about 60 degrees downward and eventually after a minute straightened to a vertical wire extending from cloud to treeline. after another couple minutes it's upper connection to the clouds terminated and it 'fell' behind treeline. as if a shiny massive fishing line fell, following its own path perfectly and ended behind the trees.

i was in a state of wonder and curiosity upon seeing this oddity. i see other similar reports out there. strange.
content.summary: Long reflective distant wire descending from cloud to treeline

content.detailedDescription: While at an outdoor ampitheater, i tilted my head back and looked straight up.  i saw what i thought were stars given that they were far off and not particularly bright.  then, i detected that there were four of these "stars" in a diamond formation all moving in the same direction at the same speed.  i watched them for about 10 minutes to determine if they could be random high altitude aircraft or perhaps satellites in orbit.  what was strange to me was that they always were moving in unison at the same speed and in the same direction.  my thought was that they were either flying very high and in tremendously good formation at a very large distance apart or perhaps it was lights on what would have to have been a very huge craft of some sort.  after awhile, though still visible and moving away to the northwest, i stopped watching them and went back to watching the movie at the ampitheater.
content.summary: While at an outdoor ampitheater, i tilted my head back and looked straight up

content.detailedDescription: I went for a night run at around 9:30pm and i was looking at the sky observing the stars that i could see. there were no clouds around at the time so the airspace was clear with nothing blocking my vision of the stars. then suddenly i saw in the corner of my eye a dark blue oval shaped object emitting a light that was bright enough for anyone to see. at first i thought it would have been a plane but given the speed and colour of the light beam and how it appeared there was no way it was human. the light was not just on whatever was there the light actually came out. i would describe it as almost like some sort of lighting scan from whatever was in the sky. the light lasted approximately 1.5-2.0 seconds and then once the light beam ended it quickly disappeared not leaving any trail what so ever or sound. after that there was no more sight of the object it just disappeared into thin air .I felt confused as there was no logical explanation as to what i saw but there were no mental or physical changes to how i felt. the street lights and my phone did not have any effect from this either.
content.summary: A bright blue light. the light was emitted from an oval shape in sky above my street .

content.detailedDescription: The light object appeared again this is the 7th day in a row, i decided to write tonight here on mufon because of what follows. every other night the light object has appear it has been at sunset eventually blending into the background trying to look like a star. it starts in the north and heads south southwest every night at first it looked as if it was scanning the area tonight i can tell you that it is. as the light object moves south west he begins to disappear and i think this is it the end of its run, but something else happen. as it vanishes a new light appears larger and more blurred out and covering two quarters of the skyline, a giant white glow now sits where one has never been before. the light object reappears and this time it has a weird motion it turns to the north and the light gets bright, but as it turns to the south the light diminishes, i now know for a fact as this light object continues its path to the new light source that it is scanning for something. i will continue tracking it and will continue reporting .
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Light appearing every night

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home around 8:30pm. it was still light out. i was on rezanof st. heading toward benny benson when i noticed movement from a black object over the tree tops just about over the mission beach area. i turned left on benny benson and pulled over on mission rd. to get a better view. two people came out of a house to their vehicle. i pointed it out to them. they asked me if it was a person.I told them i had no idea. it headed out over the ocean. i drove over to mission beach and parked. i called my husband at home. our home overlooks the water. i watched it until it was almost a dot. i went home. my husband saw it with binoculars and watched it until it was out of sight. it headed straight out to sea. there is nothing out there but open water. you could pick out what appeared to be two legs and two arms held out in front. when it was at the correct angle. at first it appeared to be facing somewhat south but then it turned a bit and headed out to sea.
content.summary: Black flying humanoid shaped headed out to sea.

content.detailedDescription:
1.Working in back yard
2.Light out of corner of my eye
3.Very low flying, large commercial airline but without wings, tail, or noise
4.Object very large, flying very low and in straight line from ne of home to w of home
5.Very complicated; my thoughts kept denying what i was seeing and try to make since of it; kept telling myself i was mistaken, and that this must be an airplane at an unusual angle and that was why i couldn't see any wings or tail; the fact that it made no noise and appearing so close was very confusing.
6.Object flew out of sight; live in forest, so tall trees blocked further view
content.summary: Working in back yard and orange object out of corner of my eye; looked up and saw orange cigar shaped object

content.detailedDescription: I looked out of my angle bay window which faces south and saw a stationary black sphere hovering. i went outside and saw it move to the left and hover again. there were no bird wings and no fluctuation of movement. it was not a bird. it was not a balloon, helicopter, or plane. it was a hovering black sphere. i went inside and looked again and it was gone. i was quite excited at the time for it was my first ufo sighting.
content.summary: I saw a black sphere hovering which moved left, hovered again, and disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: while on tower ave near fulton ave i noticed two bright red/orange lights in the sky 35-40 degrees high, slightly south of due east. i immediately felt uneasy because i realized these were out of the ordinary.  i stopped and looked at them more closely and could see they were moving to the sw.  as i was watching them a third light intermittently appeared from behind the lone cloud in the area. they were all moving on the same line in the sky, the first two were about 5 degrees apart while the third was trailing about 15 degrees behind. i then pulled out my iphone to try for pics or video but i first texted a friend quickly... "ufo s in the sky!" when i looked back at the objects they were gone. in a clear area of the sky, gone in 5 seconds. my first thought was airplanes but the lights were too bright, brighter than any star and there was no navigation lights and airplanes could not have vanished that quickly.  meteor breaking up was my second guess but they were moving much slower than any meteor i've ever seen and were without any trails of any kind. a few seconds later an airliner flew over heading east from sac intl. into the same area and it was quite obvious it was a plane. i then saw a sattelite traveling east through the same region but my skyview app on my iphone revealed it as an old rocket body. it was much dimmer than the other 3 lights.
content.summary: 3 bright red/orange lights in the night sky east of sacramento

content.detailedDescription:
I was out in my backyard with my friend and my sister. we were just hanging around and could not have missed the object as it was large and lower than a helicopter would typically fly.
it was closer to my neighbors backyard but hovered over towards us. i was in awe and excited and happy as i had always hoped to see such a thing. it was silver and acorn like or a tear drop shape. 
my guess is that it was only 180 feet high. it was almost directly overhead. i witnessed it along with my friend and sister. it was silent and moved in the horizon toward the east or ne. it stopped, went down toward the ground some. this is all very slow. then back up. it seemed to do a slow zig zag as if it were checking out or observing the area and maybe even us. i waved at the object repeatedly. this made my friend and sister nervous. i think it may have seen us there. 
it was not a balloon. it was more round toward the bottom and spun quickly.
plus the way it moved a balloon could not. it hovered about 70 degrees above us for a while this way then when it left it ascended diagonally toward the north east gradually but once it was about, i would say 400 feet( maybe?) it was going so fast that it completely disappeared into the atmosphere within a second. 
i was hesitant to move and watched it the whole time. i could have run for a camera but i did not want to miss seeing it.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: I watched a teardrop shaped metal object maybe the size of a car or larger hover overhead from my neighbors backyard into mine. it changed directions a few times. hovered in one place for a while too. it was clearly turning like a top and was reflecting

content.detailedDescription: My wife went out and there it was, she came back in screaming, myself & the hired man went out,& sure enough,there was this object,parked by our house.Itwent up about 3ft,then hoverd there for about 2 min,before takeing off in a se direction,at approx.20% angle.There was no noise & no exhaust from the object,we could see the lights inside,with a bright white ceiling. as it disappeared in about 10-15 sec.It had a flare behind it,i assume that was caused from the friction of the atmosphere.I have 2 witnesses,& we were less than 10 ft. away from it
content.summary: Shaped like a curling rock,about 15ft. in dia.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving up the norweigin grade towards thousand oaks.  blinking lights made me first notice the object.  i lost sight of the object when i continued up the grade.  when i got to thousand oaks, it was further east than it had been.  it was not a plane...Too large.
content.summary: Oblong 3 separate lights slowly moving

content.detailedDescription: I was at  restaurant , sitting by water with a friend. some dolphines were feeding so i got up and took 7 pictures. went back and sat down . i looked at pictures and in 6of the 7 pics there appears to be a half moon. then there is a teardrop cloud going near it. the in other photo a pink circle and a pink cone surround half moon. it moves to the left of the sun, then above the sun then to right of sun. i had stopped taking pics cause dolphines were done feeding. theses pics were all at 6:42 pm. there is no moon visable. went and took another pic at 6:46 pm. there is something there. and i did not use a flash.
content.summary: I took some pictures of dolphines. . when i looked at pics  6 of the pics have something in sky

content.detailedDescription:
It was near the engolasters lake.
first i think it was the moon or a globus, but after the object went n to ne and i could see some lights (i think they were but i am not sure at this point, maybe blue).
the object first was stopping but then it began move slowly and at 15 mins aprox. its accelerations was very fast and dissapier.
first i don't look the object seriously but when it began move i was very exciting, it was amazing.
content.summary: Liminous ball

content.detailedDescription:
1. field near bullstown, ashbourne co. meath - making pict. of horses and landscape.
2. object was invisible for us - founded on pict. of three.
content.summary: Fast object like missle

content.detailedDescription: At 630pm, i was standing on my patio and saw a bright star like light to the sw of las vegas, thought it was venus at first but it was bigger than seeing a star so i got my spotter scope and looked at it and saw a circle of lights with many lights in center connecting like a spider web floating like a leaf but whipping in the wind flipping and turning slowly over floating south west. i thought that it could not be a weather balloon because of all the lights. it was interesting and i have never seen any objects in the sky like this, we see planes flying all over the sky and a couple flew past this object, i wonder if any passengers saw it too. i lost sight of it as it got closer to the mountains and went behind the clouds southwest of blue diamond.
content.summary: .Circle of lights floating like leaf in the wind over sw las vegas.

content.detailedDescription:
A few weeks ago i started witnessing small ufo crafts flying in a similar path every night, one after the other, and for about four hours from 7:00 p.M. to midnight, when i go outside to view the clear night skies. the crafts descend into the trees across the street, along the branches, and change into small blinking orb like lights. the small blinking lights also resemble stars as well. sometimes the crafts move back and forth between the trees and get very bright like a huge star. most of the time the lights blink off and on, and sometimes disappear before my eyes. i do not see them during the day, and so i am not sure if they remain in the sames place.
my mother and my brother have both witnessed the lights as well. i do not want to sound paranoid, but at times i feel the lights play hide and seek, and move behind the branches to hide. sometimes, i feel like they are watching us. there are more lights coming every night, and lately the lights stay hidden more then they make themselves noticeable. i just want to know what the lights are, and if anyone else is seeing anything like this too?
content.summary: A few weeks ago i started witnessing small ufo crafts flying over my brothers place, one after another,  every night from 7:00 p.M. to midnight descending into the trees. they are small and without noise, and seem to change into star or orb like lights.

content.detailedDescription:
I returned home after a closing shift at home depot about 2345 in mid oct. (no sure of the year but was close to the turn of the century).  i wanted to see a passing comet which was supposed to be at it's best that night.  however; there was a very heavy fog that night, and as i got out of the car in my drive, i noticed a large ship about 60 ft in dia. with 5 large lights glowing like 40 watt lights in the back yard beside a hydro power line.  it reminded me of a surgical theatre light in a hospital!

it was painted a 'battle-ship' grey.  the sides of the ship went up at 90 degrees into the fog ( i was unable to see the top of the ship or any windows).

it hovered about 40 - 50 ft off the ground and i was able to walk up to and under it.  it made no sound at all!  there was a fairly stiff wind blowing at the time, but the craft hovered "rock-solid" against it.

i suspect that it was watching aircraft that might be making an ils approach to the local airport (cykf) as the ils beam of runway 26 runs just to the north of its position.  it would be hidden from radar because of a large hill just to the east.  the captain must have know his position very well since he was sitting beside a 110,000 volt power line not more that 50 ft away.

my impression was not fear but amazement.  to see first hand that ufo's do exist and are not just unexplained lights in the sky.  the weather was getting bad and i thought it better to go into the house.  thus, i don't know how long it was there.

i didn't have a camera so no other evidence other than a sketch is available.
content.summary: Look like a round light normally found in a hostial sergical room with 5 large solfty glowing lights in the bottom.

content.detailedDescription: Driving south on i95 on way home from work in traffic when i noticed one then 6 more very far away like maybe above the bronx . this was so weird and scary that i called my wife and asked her to turn on news that we may be being bombed. multiple cars pulled over to look and it appeared over 30 car witnessed same event that lasted about 15 min
content.summary: 7 smoke like meteors dark black with black trail coming down like missiles

content.detailedDescription: Object changed shape (seemed to rotate counter clock wise).  no movement noticed, no sound, which is unusual in that the f18's flying from oceania nas are very loud even miles away.
content.summary: Repeat appearance of case # 51775

content.detailedDescription:
coming back from tampa on highway 60 to home in june of this year around 8:30 or 9:00 pm in a very remote part of the highway looking toward interstate 95 i saw orbs moving around in different directions in the sky.  the orbs moved back and forth then merged and headed toward the ocean.  as i kept moving east i saw a huge craft which was very bright and about the size of a football stadium.  i remained very calm, had a camera next to me but did not take any pictures, just remained calm.  the object was moving very slow and coming toward me about 500 feet to 1000 feet off the ground and absolutely silent.  the object got really close about 20 yards away i looked up and could see that the whole bottom was open and could see up inside the object.  there were structural beams inside as possible docking stations.  the whole bottom  was extremely bright.  i was so fixed at looking at the bottom i am not sure what the structure was, possible acorn or oval.  this thing was huge, as big as a stadium and so extremely bright.
     i just remember having no fear, no excitement, but possibly some memory loss.
content.summary: Saw orbes/ then mother ship with bottom door open, extremely bright.

content.detailedDescription:
It's a long one, please bear with me. come to find out, i was not the only person who witnessed something around the same time as this incident and i will expand on that later... this past saturday (10/26/2013), i was driving in my boyfriend's car to pick up something for dinner. my vehicle has been dead for a week or so now, so i've been using his to go to work, town, etc. he was dozing on the couch and neither of us felt like going anywhere, even though we were both hungry. finally my stomach won out and i left the house at approximately 7:56-7:59pm et. it was full dark outside.

this sounds cliche, but from the time i got ready to head out to when i got in the car, i had this very strange, uneasy, ominous feeling. it felt as though i was being watched, or if you've ever experienced this: like when you get a hunch that something negative might happen. i shrugged it off and got underway, headed w/sw down godwin lake rd. toward green path rd which runs sw off godwin lake and ties into harnett-dunn highway (hwy 55). 

my elderly landlady happened to call me after i got just about a mile or two down the road from my house, which was around the time i first noticed this object in the sky to my sw. her call came in at 8:02pm. i cannot recall if i had made note of it before or after she called, but it was very close to that time either way. at first, i saw it off in the distance, fairly high above the treeline. it was extremely bright, i thought for a few seconds that it was a bright star, or maybe venus, and then as i came around a bend to a straight away where there are open fields on both sides, i saw it was definitely too large to be a star or planet. 

i said nothing to my landlady as she chattered on and i struggled to pay attention. after my star notion, i thought it had to be a cell tower, but there are none like that around here and this thing was much too close to the ground now and far too bright, maybe 300 feet or so above the tree line on the far side of the field to my left. these thoughts cycled through my mind in the span of maybe 5-10 seconds when this incredibly bright white orb-like light descended, became larger and then i realized, closer, very quickly and i knew then that it was not a stationary object. it had to be some sort of a plane or helicopter, i thought, but there were no telltale anti-collision lights blinking on the craft and i could hear no engines or rotors. i did not note any other aircraft in the area at that time. i got out my cell phone almost immediately to take a video, but i was too distracted with trying to drive, talk to my landlady via bluetooth, and watch this thing at the same time. as i got toward the end of the stretch of fields, closer to green path rd, it looked as though the now slightly misshapen orb was moving along in the same direction as i was. i still didn't think too much of it. 

i lost sight of it temporarily amid some trees as i hung a left and headed south down green path rd toward hwy 55. it's about 1/2 to 3/4 mile i'd say to the 4-way intersection. the object was almost directly across from me when i stopped at the stop-sign and signaled to turn right on hwy 55. there were no other cars around at this point in time. the light seemed to hover behind some trees just across the intersection where i couldn't see it that well. i got a little weirded out at this point, thinking it had to be some police helicopter or something that for whatever reason was singling out my car.

my boyfriend is into amateur radio and has several antennas on the back of the vehicle, though none of them were transmitting or receiving at the time and it would have been too dark to see them. still, i thought maybe for this reason car looked suspicious? i was puzzled. while my landlady kept talking, i made my way down hwy 55 toward dunn and hwy 421 and noted that this bright light was tracking along with me, i could see it just below the tree line to my left, the luminescence flickering through the upper branches as i sped along. i thought, this cannot be happening. this is not real, i'm just being paranoid for no reason, etc.

i started to get really scared, though. it felt totally irrational but i was near panic watching this object track along with my vehicle, which was the only one on that stretch of road at the time. i debated whether to try and hold out the rest of the way to dunn where there would be civilization (so-to-speak), but fear got the best of me and i stomped on the brakes at the first sign of a decent place to turn around. i whipped my vehicle into the entrance to a small church on my left, maybe 1.5-2.0 miles from where i got onto 55 from green path. 

keeping an eye, on the bright white craft, i looked up as i was pulling into the dirt drive and saw that whatever it was had stopped dead in the sky where i turned in, hovering directly in front of my car where it had a clear view of me between the building and a couple of large spruce trees/other structures. it appeared to be staring right at me and simultaneously i got a strong feeling of being watched. 

i judged it to be maybe 300-500ft up. at this point i saw that the craft had definitely changed shape. though i couldn't make out any solid structures, it appeared oblong, almost diamond shaped, shining a white-gold/yellowish so brightly that rays were coming out of it, kind of like you might see in a sunburst effect on an edited photograph. though it shone from everywhere on the craft, there appeared to be slightly longer rays at each point of the object. i also noted an even longer ray/beam of light that came off of the bottom of the craft, tapering down and ended in a point, giving it a long stretched out diamond shape. from my perspective at the time, the whole thing was probably the size of a nickel. 

in addition to the oblong shape and bright rays, it also seemed that there were a few smaller, brighter, almost white lights or structures of some arranged almost geometrically in the body of the object, but it was too bright to tell for sure. i knew the instant i saw the thing stop with me and hover silently that it was watching my progress. that's when i freaked out. i finally interrupted my landlady's long train of conversation and blurted out that i was really afraid, panic beginning to color my voice and kick-start my adrenaline. it took me only a few seconds to turn the car around the church's small roundabout driveway. i gunned it recklessly in front of a string of 3-4 cars heading east, not about to stay in that location for another second. 

alarmed at the sound of my voice and nearly incoherent speech, my landlady told me she would get off the phone and let me focus on driving. i was so terrified i yelled "no!!!! please stay on the phone with me!! i'm coming back that way." i begged her to stay on the line, driving maniacally back down 55 toward green path, barely keeping it between the ditches and not daring to look out the passenger window to see if this light was still following me. i am not sure what all i said in my panicked state, but i did tell her i thought someone or something might be following me and kept repeating how scared i was. 

i literally thought i was going insane and she probably did too. i don't get disturbed like that, ever, and i'm pretty sure i was frightening my landlady, who was in the process of trying to get my landlord on their other house phone so he could talk to me as well. i never looked up from the road from the time i turned around at the church to the point that i  had turned back onto godwin lake rd from green path rd, which was maybe the span of 2-3 miles, if that. 

finally, as i got back on the long stretch of fields on godwin lake where i first noticed the bright light moving west, i got enough courage to peek out of the passenger side window. to my horror, i saw that the object was tracking right along with my car again, both of us moving east now in the exact opposite direction as before. it had no trouble keeping up with me, though i tried to out run it foolishly. i have never been so terrified in my life. i was in almost hysterics with my landlords on the phone, who thought there must be a car following me or a person in the car with me. they offered to drive out and meet me, but i was only a couple of miles from home, going probably 30mph over the speed limit and taking blind curves while driving in both lanes, more scared of the object that was pursuing me than of a high-speed collision. all i could think of was making it home.

i never looked again after i saw the object speeding along with my car down that open stretch of road, though i know i should have. i was just to freaked out. about 1.5mi and what seemed an eternity later i sped into the main driveway of my landlords' property, turning immediately into their lit carport. i ended the phone call at 8:08pm and made a mad dash for the side door, not even bothering to knock much less look behind me. the whole experience had only lasted about 6-8 minutes over the span of just a few miles, but it felt like an hour had passed. 

i slammed their door behind me and locked the deadbolt, knowing full well that if it was something out of the ordinary a locked door wouldn't help much. i ran into their living room half-crazed, trying to relay to them what had just happened. adrenaline still singing through my veins, my whole body shook with tremors for a good 15-20 minutes as i sat on their living room couch. they had never seen me like that, nor have i ever been so rattled. i was finally able to tell them the whole story. my disabled landlord was seated on the recliner. he wanted the front door open so he could look out the storm door and see if there was anything outside but i begged my landlady not to open it. they chalked it up to an over-zealous police helicopter or a military drone or something of that nature. i guess it could have been, but whatever it was made no noise whatsoever, and neither of those things can change their shape to my knowledge. perhaps what frightened me the most, was that this object not only tracked my progress, it followed me home. it knows where i live. 

being the kind folks that they are, and seeing how badly shaken i was, my landlords insisted on driving to town for me to pick up the dinner i never managed to get. i politely refused multiple times, my hunger long since gone, but they wouldn't take no for an answer. finally, we all piled into their old truck at about 8:30pm and headed out of the gravel driveway. he asked me if i wanted to go back the way i had come from, to see if this thing was still there. i was extremely curious, especially now that i had others with me, but i was unwilling to go through that fearful ordeal a second time. i don't know why i was so terrified, because i was also very intrigued, but the fear would not go away. instead, we headed north toward the town of benson. sitting shotgun with my eyes to the sky, i almost immediately noted an abundance of aircraft, maybe 5-10, all flying fairly high up toward the sw. about 2 miles down hwy 242, we gazed off to the west over an open expanse of farmland that ended in a treeline, the light from the town of dunn visible in the distance. we were looking in the same direction that i had seen the bright craft, and sure enough, the three of us saw a large sphere-like orb that was glowing a rusty orange color. it hovered in the sky, not moving. i was sure this had to be the same thing that i saw, or at least something related to it. we continued to catch glimpses of it hanging there maybe 800ft-2000ft up in the distance until the trees swallowed our view completely. 

we finally got the food i had initially set out for, and headed back south down 242. this time, the orb was gone. my landlord dropped off my landlady and i, deciding he would drive up the road to the place where i first witnessed the object. we huddled inside until he came back and reported that he saw nothing. marginally relieved, but still uneasy, i drove the car back to our house around 9:00-9:15 and told my boyfriend what had happened while he ate the food i brought. i had no appetite. i'm pretty sure i freaked him out too because he barely said a word. i had to be at work early the next morning and i was sure i wouldn't be able to sleep in our loft bedroom, which features 2 skylights and a long panoramic window above the bed. all i could think of was what if it comes back after i go to bed? what if i wake up and see bright lights through the skylights? or worse, in the room with me? silly, i know, but after about 10 minutes of silence we broke down and got into the car, driving 30+ miles to my boyfriends' family's house, where i slept on the floor with the ceiling light on. i felt like a 5 year old, but the fear would not go away. i've slowly calmed down over the past couple of days, but i doubt i'll be driving that way at night alone anymore if i can help it.

i was sure i wasn't the only one who had seen this thing. it was too obvious. the next day, i decided to search for other reports. sure enough, another person in the town of fuquay-varina, not from us, reported seeing a glowing orb that seemed to hover in the sky, changing shape and color. she stated that she had video and pictures, which i would very much like to see for comparison. there were more reports up the east coast that also described "orange and white orbs" sounding much like what i saw. this made me feel a little less crazy, knowing i wasn't alone in witnessing something strange. i regret not trying to take a video, for being too scared to watch the object's progress along side me that night, and for not agreeing to go back that way again when my landlords took me to town. it could have been something utterly rational, but for me it was just too weird to be explained. currently, i'm caught between a morbid curiosity to see it again, and a desperate wild hope that it never comes back. either way, whoever or whatever it was knows where i live. 

i apologize for the great length, but i wanted to be as detailed as possible.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: Driving into town and some type of craft was tracking with my car

content.detailedDescription: I was at home, outside because i couldn't sleep, something had woken both myself and my partner up. my partner was with me, but he didn't see the light.I was already looking up at the night sky because it was slightly cloudy and had been raining earlier in the day. it just flashed once, as if someone had turned on a flood light. very bright almost double of the brightest star/planet. at first i was in disbelief but quickly started becoming very curious as to what the source of light was.
content.summary: Just seen a very bright flash, brighter than any star. then it disappeared as quickly as it came.

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i were out hunting grouse on a logging trail se of ryder lake, near chilliwack, bc.  we stopped to photograph a beautiful view of the valley and surrounding mountains when we noticed a small orange sphere  flash quickly (almost like a reflective flare) and disappear. it was a very brief glimpse and we did not think anything of it. we did not realize that we had captured the image on camera until later that evening.  i assumed at the time that it must have been a strange reflection off something in the valley below us but upon viewing the photographs assumed it was a lens flare resulting from the reflection off something.  a friend of mine suggested sending it to her fiancee who is an film editor so he could try to clean up the image to better view it.  however, he suggested it was not lens flare because we saw a flash with the naked eye, and because while the sphere moves, we were not moving while taking the photograph.  this submission is the result of jovial pressure from a friend for an expert to follow up.  i would be happy to send you the original photographs upon request but as i am writing this from work cannot do so.
content.summary: Glowing orange sphere moved upwards, flashed brightly, then disappeared.

content.detailedDescription:
I was star gazing, looking east when i decided to lean back and look overhead. i observed 2 or 3 orbs going from north to south ( short distance- 3 fist wide?), that is when what has to be a huge ship uncloaked and engaged sending the same type of plasma fire ball back which would just disappear behind some type of cloak. the ship would re-cloak and only be visible when firing. this went on between 3 to 5 minutes. this ship was huge and reminded me of something out of "starwars", needless to say i was very scared and it put a hamper on my star gazing for sometime. it was stationary and then it was over and just disappeared. i was so stunned and did not want to believe what i had seen, i observed for approximately another hour and nothing.
i was so stunned and scared, that i finally woke my husband who believed me but wanted to calm me saying that just probably meteorites. i've seen hundreds if not thousands of meteorites, they don't come from ships.
content.summary: Stargazing when an orb whent from n to s and seemed to hit an inviable wall at that moment  a huge ship was revealed ejecting same type of orb in opposite direction which seemed to hit another cloaked ( never saw  what was shooting from n)

content.detailedDescription: This has been an ongoing event since i first reported it last week.  fortunately, it has mostly been clear at night with the exception of one night and that was just scattered cloud cover.  so i was able to observe the orb again.  it always starts to appear right before dark, before stars even appear.  it seems to be the size of jupiter or venus when i first see it, but it appears to grow nearer and larger and much brighter.  it was so bright and large at one time, that my eyes were very sensitive to it and it bothered me to look at it.  as it reaches it's most brightest and largest size, it appears right over top of the sky over the hill of my neighbors house.  then, it begins to slowly move away (backwards) and grow dimmer.  then off to the left where it seems to grow bright once again, and then it descends slowly behind the hillside of trees.  it repeats this exact pattern each night.  my entire family has witnessed this event several nights in a row.  we could not see anything not even stars last night because it has been raining and cloudy here since yesterday.  i do not have any feeling of anything threatening or evil, it's just kind of like i am curious as to what it is, i guess i am still searching for a logical explanation.  i tried to get video, my camera didn't do very well but i did manage to get a few pics, so did my sister of the one she saw just 11 miles away.  when the sky is clear, we will continue to watch and will report any further sightings.  if anyone is seeing anything similar to this, it looks like a gigantic star that moves very slowly, please report it so we can find out what it is.
content.summary: Has recurred every night since i reported it first last week.  same flight pattern, same time each evening.

content.detailedDescription: I would prefer to talk to someone first.   has anyone else ever reported something like this?
content.summary: Cylindrical, approximately 2.5 feet in diameter, length unknown.

content.detailedDescription:
For the last few months i am recording during night the sky with my night vision. i am sleeping during the recordings but i am checking these recordings the following day. i am recording a lot of meteors and planes. during the night of october 28, 2013 in the little village cernovice u tabora in south bohemia i did a recording of two flying and blinking objects with two different shapes that do not look to me as airplanes. the date and time on the video recordings are not correct for unknown reasons. 
i do see airplanes in this region so maybe these are just ordinary airplanes. i don't know. i did not witness it myself. i will continue to do my nightvision recordings.
content.summary: 2 flying blinking lights recorded during night with night vision

content.detailedDescription:
I have been going out in my back yard and a star that is multicolored is in the sky in the east and when i watch it it appears to move up and down and back and forth in the sky, i watched it several nights and it is moving around and i look at other stars to make sure it is not my eyes but this things is moving around!
i went to you tube and others are reporting a multi colored star, i wish i had someone to come here and tell me what this is, it has been there every night i go out with my dog!
content.summary: Multicolored star that is moving around up and down sideways

content.detailedDescription: The camera used was of low resolution, brand and model are: canon sd1000 and only has 7.1 megapixels. my mother said they did not notice anything strange in the sky that day that everything was normal and it was in the picture i just realized, and this happened on the 29th july 2012. my mom and i are quite informed about this issue and that there are lots of fakes about ufo's photos, but i can assure you that the photo is 100% real, and i've had experiences before but unfortunately i have no evidence.
content.summary: Alleged ufo appears in photograph taken at machu picchu

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: I live in a 5th floor apartment in downtown baltimore. my wall facing the north is a huge window that stretches in parts from the living room, dining room to the bedroom. i have a clear view of the john hopkins hospital, the inner harbor, downtown and also north east baltimorew city. this was a massive sighting. all the lights were off inmy house and at first i noticed 3 blinking white lights overhead. from there i witnessed many objects coming in from the west. they would suddenly appear over the big downtown baltimore cemetery that is adgacent to greenmount aveneue between preston street and north ave. they started to come in a processsion, a parade. most were moving at the same altitude but there were others that were lower and others which were higher. i have a pair of binoculars and focused in on both ones near and far. the shapes of the crafts were very hard to determine but the way the lights pulsated and blinked in  a pattern was quite different than anything i ever saw before. i have never witnessed hardly any aircraft flying in the area. i mean this is downtown baltimore and like most major cities, i am positive this is a no fly zone. i called two friends over and they were astounded. i tried to film it with my digital camera and even though i focused the camera directly on many ships, the ship and the lights would not show up. i tried numerous times. i attempted to take pictures with my cell phone and also with my digital camera. what i was seeing with the naked eye, was not appearing on any of my electronic devices. after about an hour or an hour and a half, the sky quieted down some. in the inital procession, i think it is fair to say there were at least 30 ships that moved by. another thing i noticed when looking through the binoculars, they were not moving like a plane or helicopter does. they sort of thrusted and jolted every few seconds like with bursts if energy they appeared to be gliding in small bursts. i also noted a few that moved in absolutely strange and unfamiliar patterns like a pryamid. i continued to watch out the window and more came. so many flew into, over, around and then away from downtown baltimore, i soon lost count. it had to be over 100. there were no sounds. however when a helicopted was flying in the same distance, you could hear it. also when they would fly over the joh hopkins complex they would begin to glow very white and very bright and the green and red lights would disappear. they also looked like this over the inner harbor but it is a little distance from  my building so i am not sure if i was able to really get an accurate description from that far. i am certain of what i saw and i am saddened i could not get any type of video or picture of it. but i did have two witnesses. and a third one if you include my friends dog who climbed up in the window and you could tell he too also sensed something there. i hope other people in maryland saw this and come forward. i will continue watching this evening. it is now 10:45pm. i just lloked out he window the west and there is an enormous one appraohing. i will return tomorrow and add a new report if needed and continue to watch the skies tonight and tomorrow and after wards too.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other,Unknown
content.summary: Mass sighting many objects with lights flying right over inner harbor & downtown
